description: This file defines Pydantic data models related to content entities, including base schemas for content creation, updating, reading, and listing responses.

classes.name: ContentBase
classes.description: Shared content fields for create and update operations.

classes.name: ContentCreate
classes.description: Payload model for creating new content.

classes.name: ContentUpdate
classes.description: Payload model for updating existing content.

classes.name: ContentRead
classes.description: Response model representing content with metadata.

classes.name: ContentListResponse
classes.description: Response envelope for listing content items.
